name: Ball Bouncing (itch)
description:
Welcome In a Ball Jump Tap screen Ball Jump and avoid obstacles. Ball Jump is simple Game the goal is: Break through the blue colored cubes while ball jumping and avoiding the red spikes and cubes.
Collect gems to unlock over 30 different playable characters. Choose from a variety of colored

marbles, eye-balls, dogs, pigs, ducks, shooting stars, magical orbs and much more.

Caractéristiques du produit
  • Unlock 38 Different Balls & Characters
  • Collect Gems for Higher Score
  • Great Visuals + Amazing Soundtrack
  • Fun & Addicting Gameplay
  • Almost Impossible to Beat!
